reviews.review_text: The Greek gas town was amazing!! We had excellent service by Adam. The happy hour is from 2pm - 5pm everyday with lots of drinks and food options. We ordered a Greek feta salad, pork souvlaki, lamb souvlaki skewers and the platter for 2 in which we got chicken skewers, pork skewers and tiger shrimp. I highly recommend checking this place out as it has many options and it s located in a great area. Will surely be back to try the other options.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jeremiah, Thank you so much for this incredible review. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our Happy Hour and that Adam made sure you had such a great time! We hope you come back soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: The food was delicious, the server was attentive and did make some nice suggestions but didnt check on us again after dropping off our food until we were ready for the bill. It was overall a very nice experience with very good food.

20/10 Experience! I cannot express my appreciated enough to Skerdi (the Manager) and ALL the staff who made our night absolutely amazing. We had an intimate wedding ceremony and dinner here and the experience was absolutely perfect. The food and service were remarkable. All my guests were raving about it! Highly recommend The Greek Gastown to anyone looking to plan a fun event or even just a dinner. AMAZING! Dietary restrictions: I had guests with shellfish allergies, peanut allergies and vegetarians. They were able to accommodate everyone!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow, Natalie! Thank you so much for your incredibly kind words! We were so happy to host you, your family, and your friends for such a beautiful occasion! We look forward to having you and Daniel in again to visit soon! Enjoy married life! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: The Greek cares for their customers, and when I had a less than 5 star experience, the restaurant contacted me to make things right. I can confidently say that the food at the Greek is delicious - happy hour is everyday from 2-5pm with a great assortment of dishes and drinks. Highly recommend the platter to share. Flavors were on point.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Audrey! We are so sorry for the late reply and we appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback. I would love to personally hear more about your experience. Can you please send me an email at kaity@thegreekbyanatoli.com with a phone number and a good time to call? Sincerely Kaity Allen Regional Manager

reviews.review_text: The server that works most weekday lunch is always super friendly and helpful. We were a party of 8 that arrived sporadically over 30 minutes. As we had our lunch order ready to go, our server offered to take down the orders first and then send them to the kitchen once we were close to being all here. The timing worked out great and we could not have had a better meal. We definitely will be back!

I had been searching for an authentic Greek restaurant to celebrate my moms birthday, and I must say, this place went above and beyond my expectations. Our group of four had an amazing experience from the moment we walked in, thanks to the incredible service. Our server, Adam, was exceptionally welcoming and excelled in every aspect. The service provided was truly top-notch. The food itself was incredibly delicious, and the restaurants modern and cool atmosphere added to the overall vibe. Without a doubt, I wholeheartedly recommend this place with a perfect rating of 5 out of 5.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Amanda! Thank you so much for this glowing review! We are so happy to hear that you had such a great a great time for your moms birthday! We will be sure to let Adam know to keep being his wonderful self! We hope you come back to visit soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Excellent Greek food. Extra crispy calamari, delectable dips and their slouvaki platter was incredible. Lives up to their big portions too! The atmosphere was awesome. Make sure to book in advance since the restaurant was packed. Will definitely come again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi David! Thanks for this amazing review! We are so happy to hear you loved the food and had a great time! We hope you come back soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Have been here a few times before and I ve enjoyed it every time! Came here most recently on a date night. Wine was on special - $3 off an 8oz glass. We shared the lamb platter and had an appetizer too! Everything was delicious and the customer service was great! Highly recommend for Greek food in the downtown and Gastown area.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shae! Thank you so much for leaving us this wonderful review! We are so glad to hear  you enjoyed the Lamb platter and felt that service was great! We hope that you come back to visit us again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Great food and drinks. DJ was on point with the music as well, he definitely added to the atmosphere. Thanks Adam for looking after us, you were amazing!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rachel! Thanks for the great review! Come back and visit soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: We came to The Greek to celebrate my friends birthday and wow!! It did not disappoint. Our server, Adam, was exceptional. He was kind, welcoming, offered great recommendations, and made us feel like truly valued guests. We greatly appreciated how he went above and beyond to make our night feel special. The dishes were incredible too... Highly highly recommend the octopothi dish, it was out of this world! I dont think Ive had a better octopus dish in my life.. The baked feta is also absolutely incredible. I highly recommend this restaurant for an authentic, fun, and welcoming Greek experience! Thanks to Adam and the team for making our celebration unforgettable!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Adam! Thank you so so much for this incredibly kind review! We agree that octopothi is definitely a must try! We hope that you will come back and visit Adam and the rest of the team sometime soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: 10/10 experience. Absolutely loved Adam as our server. The vibes were great and Adam made sure of it. No girls night is complete without Adam and multiple rounds of Helen s Sangria. Cheers
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Brooke, We will be sure to let Adam that he is now a staple for any decent girls night! Come back to visit soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: What can I say incredible food. Excellent vegan options clearly marked. We loved the vegan moussaka! Be prepared to take your time because the food is carefully crafted by order. The patio is small but nice for people watching and enjoying the fresh air.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hope! Thank you so much for this great review! We are so happy to be able to offer some great vegan options. We hope you come visit again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: We were shopping in Gastown and had already decided to go here for lunch. We were greeted with a very nice server. He was attentive and friendly. We ended up getting the lamb platter, Taramasalata and the Greek salad. Generous portions. The food was delicious. We loved the Christmas vibes and decoration.

A group of 20 of us came in to celebrate a birthday, and wow did The Greek ever deliver! Our server, Adam, was so accommodating and truly added so much value to the night. The food, drinks and ambiance were incredible. Couldn t recommend more!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alanna! So glad that you all had such a great time! We will be sure to pass on your kind words to Adam! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Popped in Friday night, 3 of us. Friendly staff, cool atmosphere, very impressive menu. Good portions great size, good value, quick service. Had a group of four friends join for a drink while they waited for their rezo next door, to which the staff welcomed and accommodated for them too. 10/10 would recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Cameron! Thank you so much for the great review! We are so happy to hear that you had a great time on your visit with us. Come back to see us anytime! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: My pup, partner and I loved this place! Atmosphere was great! The staff was really friendly and amazing too! Food was delicious and very reasonable priced compared to surroundings restaurant. They even prioritized us over Someone in front of us to put us on the outside patio because we had a dog with us. Guy in front was not happy about it. We didn t expect it at all but we re really great full
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Buddhism Beats, Thank you for leaving us this great review. We are so happy to hear that you, your partner, and your pup had such a great time! Please come back to visit soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: First time trying this restaurant and I loved it, it is delicious, without a doubt a place I would return to and I highly recommend it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Carla! We are so happy to hear that you had such a great experience with us! We really appreciate the review and hope to see you again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: The food was very nice and the service was super friendly. We found the rap music way too loud: we could only talk if sitting in the corner  and outside people smoke (we are not used to that). We found the portions too big as half the plates went back to the kitchen which is such a waste but apparently people like huge quantities. Quality Greek food though.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Veronique, We are so happy to hear you like the food and enjoyed the service. We will definitely talk to the team about appropriate music levels. We hope you will come back to visit us soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: The best food we have had in Vancouver. Moreover, the best Greek food I ve tried so far including some parts of Greece. This is more amazing if you consider that we are half Turkish and half Greek  A place to come frequently with your friends to enjoy top quality food in a lovely ambiance
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Munevver! Thank you so much for these incredibly kind words! We absolutely love to hear that we are measuring up to all the amazing food in Greece! We hope that you will come back to visit again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: 20/10 on all fronts. Adam served us tonight and gave us by far the best care I ve ever had at a restaurant. And the FOOD! Lights out good. Incredible experience.

Spent my birthday here. Discovered the restaurant while passing by roaming around Gastown after meal few days ago. Greek Gastown is a spacious loft style with a bar in the centre. Nice and comfortable with friendly wait staffs who are attentive. The food is good for sharing and large variety of drinks selection Happy hours from 2-5 and 9 to closing.

It was our first time in Gastown and we stumbled upon The Greek for lunch. It was the most delicious meal and everything we could have hoped for.  We were introduced to Avgolemeno soup which was wonderful.  Then the  lamb chops were tender and perfectly flavoured with rosemary. I would definitely recommend this place and happily return there for a meal. Adam was so friendly, helpful and attentive.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Susan! Thank you so much for these incredibly kind words. Please come back and have some more avgolemono soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Looking for a fun, delicious and entertaining night? The Greek is the place you want to be. Our server was Adam (Zach Adam), he gave great recommendations, conversation and was accommodating to all food allergies at our table. Highly recommend. Friendly staff and drool worthy zucchini chips.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kennedy, We are so happy to hear that Adam was able to make sure you had a great time! We hope you come back to visit us again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Service is tremendously amazing. Adam our server, was so efficient in service. Accommodated so quickly to the new on-comers to our group. We didn t even have to request, he took full on initiative to bring an extra chair before we could even say a word. He sanitized our table so quick which made it aesthetically pleasing for the new guests! Amanda and the crew are superb. Food, music, service is top notch. This place is a VIBE!

A large party of us were there on a Saturday night and we received excellent service from Adam. Drinks and food came out quickly despite our large party and all the food was delicious! Adam took great care of us and I highly recommend The Greek in Gastown!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Daniel! Thanks for the great review! We are so happy to hear that Adam took such good care of you! We hope you come visit again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: We enjoyed our stop in here! Food was delicious, service was perfect, cocktails on point and couldnt ask for more! Would recommend and visit again!

The prices defy the refined atmosphere  of the restaurant. The menu is quite expansive with a good selection of Greek dishes, wines, and desserts. The fried calamari and salads were well presented. Service is timely, polite, and respectful. Recommended for dinner, as the restaurant as well as streets look prettier at night.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Gaurav, Thank you so much for these incredibly kind words. We appreciate the great review and are so happy to hear you loved our offerings. We hope to have you in again asap! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: I am going to share my experience. Are you ready? I SAID ARE YOU READY? Okay, assuming youre ready, heres whats up First off Skerdi is the best GM in Gastown. Secondly, Adam and Brandon make a fantastic team. The food. The food is a WHOLE DIFFERENT REVIEW. This review was about the peeps.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jamie! Thank you so much for this incredible review. We will be sure to pass on your feedback to Skerdi, Brandon, and Adam! Please come back to visit soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous meal. Happy Hour prices are very reasonable. We had the Spanakopita, Keftedes, Gyro Merida, Pork Souvlaki, Greek salad and Greek potatoes. Accompanied by the Anatoli Red and white wines. All very, very tasty and great value. The staff are all very welcoming and friendly. Should have taken more photos but devoured the food!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing Conor!! We re so happy to hear what a great experience you had. We can t wait to see you for another happy hour soon!

reviews.review_text: We stopped in this weekend and this place did not disappoint! This is the best calamari both of us have ever had and it was so fresh. The inside of the restaurant is super cute and the staff were very friendly as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We re so happy to have had you in this weekend! Thank you for your support & look forward to having you back soon! Cheers!

reviews.review_text: thank you so much to Adam for organizing our large party for my birthday.  Our server Rayanne was so on point with everything- we got everything we needed when we needed it.  Fantastic experience and would highly recommend The Greek Gastown for special occasions we had such a great time.)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Suneet! Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy to hear that your birthday was such a great evening! We definitely hope you come back to visit us soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of dining at this restaurant and they have an exceptional service. The manager, Skerdi, deserves special praise for his outstanding leadership. From the moment I arrived, the staff were attentive, friendly, and went above and beyond to ensure a memorable dining experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jovan, We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and will definitely pass your kind words on to Skerdi. We hope to see you again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Despite being a bit loud in here at times, the food is top notch. If you like lamb, the Country Lamb is a must try. Best Lamb shoulder Ive had in Vancouver. The Saganaki with pita is also amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We have to agree, the country lamb is an all around favourite! We look forward to having you back soon! Thanks for sharing your feedback with us!

reviews.review_text: Amazing Greek restaurant! We had the saganaki and souvlaki platter to share between two, delicious. Especially for $64 with our soft drinks / sodas. Highly recommend if you love Greek food! Instagram @kirbystaltari
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kirby! We really appreciate you taking the time to leave us this great review. So glad that you enjoyed the food. Come back and visit soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Amazing food, great service. Our favourite drink was the sangria it was amazing and favourite appies was the dip trio. All the mains were delicious but the favorite was the feta and peppers dip, he even brought out more pita so we could finish the dip. Left feeling so full and satisfied.

This cozey place is a gem amongst the many places in Gastown. It has an authentic Greek food with a great ambience. As you enter the place , you can feel the warmth with the smell of good food. We went there for lunch and although the lunch menu is a 1 pager, it has all the favourites from souvlaki to gyros and just apps including pita and dip. I had the lamb youvetsi, and this lamb just falls off the bone. The orzo and tomato soup just pop and adds a great warmth to the food. Being served in mini banbarries are great, even though you would think they warm, but they are not. The food inside is though.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jainesh! Thanks for this incredible review! We are so happy to hear that you and your guests enjoyed the food and the atmosphere! The lamb youvetsi is one of our favourites! We really hope to see you soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: We had an amazing time at the greek Gastown!  Very fun atmosphere with amazing food and great service.  The staff were so friendly and made our night!  Shouts put to Rayanne, Adam, and Skerdi the GM!  They made our night such an experience!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Brandon! Thank you so much for leaving us this incredible review! We are so happy that you had a great night and hope you come back to visit soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: I went to the Greek this afternoon for a late lunch/ early dinner and was blown away! Nima was our server she was so attentive and detail oriented and made our experience above and beyond! We ordered the dip platter, baked feta and the chicken souvlaki platter- everything was outstanding! I will absolutely be returning over and over<3
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sierra! Thank you for sharing these kind words! We will be sure to let Naima know what a great job she did for you and your guests! We cant wait to have you back in soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: The calamari are good. The dips samples are good to start too. Nice service, please sit outside. The beer is good too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Daniel!! So happy to hear you could enjoy the patio & appies! Look forward to having you back soon! Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend! The Greek gastown exceeded my expectation! I went out with some girlfriends on a Friday night and we had the best time! The food, service and atmosphere were all on point! Will definitely be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Robin, Thank you so much for this great review! We are so happy to hear that you had a great time and cant wait to host you again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Had the pleasure of dining at the Greek a few weekends ago and no surprise, was very impressed with the delicious food, great service and overall atmosphere. Scaredy took great care of us making sure our drinks were always full! A couple of my favourite menu items were the sagnaki cheese, vegan calamari and of course the souvlaki platter.  Would definitely recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jennifer! Thank you so much for your kind words! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our new vegan calamari dish! We hope you will come back soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: The only experience that has given me the urgency of completing a google review for the first time in my professional hospitality life span was prompted by two employees this afternoon. From the greeting, the seating, and the kindness that stemmed from our server and bartender was unmatched. The knowledge of product, mixed with the fun candor created  not only a safe place to share a meal and healthy conversation but a place I would feel confident recommending to friends and family. Not only did I feel like a long standing regular, but someone whose needs were met. Bartending for over 10 years and after a really hard day I required a tequila shot. The lime topping the gateway to my relaxation was trimmed perfectly and was presented with a vibrant green which celebrated my order. This may seem small, but the care taken in protecting fresh garnishes was represented proudly. Hats off to my two new friends, Rayanne, and Lane. Incredible experience. You made my dim day too bright for even sunglasses.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow Chantel, There are no words to describe how much we appreciate this glowing review. There is nothing quite like serving people who work in the industry and understand what it can be like! We appreciate you and cant wait to see you back in soon for an ouzo or two! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: We went for dinner for our friends  birthdays. The service by Rayanne was absolutely amazing. Adam on our way out made out night. We will be back!! P.s. dope dj Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Curt! Thank you so much for this great review! We will be sure to let Rayanne, Adam, and Jace (the DJ) know that they made sure your friend had a great birthday! We hope to see you back soon for another visit! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: The Greek Gastown is a neighbourhood treasure with great people, great food, and a killer happy hour. Their menu is fresh, tasty, and healthy, staying true to its Greek origins, but with lots of modern twists. Happy hour on the patio is one of the best ways to spend a couple of hours people watching and enjoying their drinks menu. The staff at the Greek are the secret sauce that makes it special. From Skerdi, the friendliest manager around, to great servers like Amanda and Adam, youre always made to feel welcomed. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Coming from the Mayor of Gastown, that is quite the praise! We appreciate you so much Paul, thanks for being one of the best guys around.

reviews.review_text: Had a birthday dinner of 20+ served by Adam. Utmost professionalism by Adam, fantastic timely service and delicious food. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Todd! Thank you so much for this great review! We are so happy to hear that Adam helped you have such a great time! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Last night, my colleague and I had an unforgettable dining experience at The Greek Gastown, and were looking forward to returning soon. The server who assisted us was delightful and knowledgeable, providing us with details about the new menu items and suggesting a pleasant wine to share. We wanted to leave her a personalized review, but we couldnt find her name on the receipt as it only had a number printed on it. We appreciate the excellent service and enjoyable evening. Thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Stryanna! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this amazing review! Were you in on Tuesday evening? I would love to be able to tell the server about what a great job they are doing! Please reach out to us at info@thegreekgastown.com whenever you would like to come in for another visit. We would love to have you! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: I stopped in the Greek tonight wondering what this place was all about. I ride my bicycle past regularly, and wondered if it would hold up to its presentation (which is seems relaxed and classy). The folks here are the real-deal (especially Fernanda who really made us feel like part of a little family happening here)  its honestly a place where you find yourself canceling other plans to just stay and enjoy the good company. I live nearby and usually avoid most of the bullsh##@ in this hood, but now im in love with this place!  Theyre a great bunch!

Get  em to The Greek! This place is fantastic. Our group really enjoyed the music (we were dancing in our seats), the food was delicious, and the service from Scaredy (hopefully I spelled that right) was excellent. What a great human! Highly recommend this place for an overall fantastic experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi J R! Thank you so much for the review! We will be sure to let Skerdi (dont worry it happens all the time) how great of a time you had. We agree, he is absolutely the best! Please come visit soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Super fun spot, went for a bday and they were able to accommodate us + super friendly. Adam was a great server
reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI Mikael! Thanks for the great review! Adam is the best! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Great food, and awesome service. We went during their happy hour and enjoyed their chicken thigh skewers, Greek salad and gyro.

The Greek restaurant Gastown was recommended by my friend Haydee ,I brought my friends from Astra pharma ,from Calgary we were greeted by our server ,shes friendly and nice .The food was delicious, we had 2 orders of calamari,souvlaki platter, saganaki ,greek salad and enjoyed their drinks too.I like the ambiance of the resto ,ill definitely go back and bring my family too
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for leaving us a review! We can t wait to host you and your family soon! Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Honestly some of the best Greek food I have ever had, and I lived in Greece for 5 years. Adding to that, the service was incredible, and just wanted to give a big shout out to Adam. He really went above and beyond, and he was so hospitable and good at what he does. Can t wait to come back and thank you the Greek by Anatoli!!

We did a private event last week at the Greek  Gastown and I cannot say enough good things about the experience. All of our guests were blown away by the service and quality of food. Will certainly use them for future events and to have a quiet dinner. Thank you again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Daniel for the kind words! We loved hosting you and your wife and cannot wait to have you in again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: This place is amazing. Our server, Adam, went above and beyond. The drinks, food and service were all phenomenal and we will be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ashley! Thank you so much for letting us know about your time with us and the great service that Adam provided. We will be sure to let him know how wonderful he is. - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Great Vibe Amazing Food Fantastic Service!!! I came with 3 friends, we ve all been to Greece 2-3 times and this food was super authentic and delicious. A Greek salad is so simple but the ingredients were so fresh and the feta was so creamy definitely a 10. The Slouvaki was fantastic rice was perfect side.Everything was amazing. Naema our server was so kind and informative she made our experience perfect. I highly recommend you try The Greek in Gastown for a delicious and authentic experience! Vegetarian options: They gad an entire section of the menu dedicated to vegetarian dishes.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Christine! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this amazing review! We are so happy to hear that you felt our food is authentic, it is definitely something we strive for! We will be sure to let Naima know that she elevated your experience in such a great way! Please come back to visit us soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: I came in for my mom s birthday and Amanda was phenomenal! Genuinely some of the best service I ve ever received. She went above and beyond to make everyone feel included and bolstered our experience tenfold.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Katelyn, Thank you so much for leaving these incredibly kind words. We are so happy to hear that Amanda was able to help make your moms birthday celebration so great! Please let us know if we can ever host for you again! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Sangria, souvlaki, Calamari and Meat Balls. Amazing food. Always a regular here!!! :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! & we have to agree with you, our sangria is a favourite & best in the city!

reviews.review_text: Amazing Greek restaurant! We had the saganaki and souvlaki platter to share between two, delicious. Especially for $64 with our sodas. Highly recommend if you love Greek food!

My office decided to try the place since were right next door. We had beat the lunch rush in. The portions were larger then what I expected, service was friendly and the food was good. Its nice to get something new in the neighbourhood. I think well be going back.

Went to The Greek for a corporate event and it was FANTASTIC. The team there (Kaity, specifically) was delightful in the run up to the event, very responsive via email and so accommodating. She made it a dream to get everything arranged. The staff onsite were great, the service was great and the food, delicious. Highly recommend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sarah! Thank you so much for letting us know about your experience with your team! We cant wait to have you back in soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: it was amazing !! the staff is super friendly and the food unbelievably good, def would recommend, the patio is in the perfect spot just in the heart of gastown. I love this place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Pamela, Thank you so much for the review! We will be sure to let the staff know how  great of a job they are doing and hope to see you back soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: It was my first time trying greek food. The food was amazing. I when there with a friend and she loved it too. The sauce was great, also the lamb was great. This restaurant left me a good start for greek food.
I loved the treatment that the manager gave me. Matter fact the food and drinks were perfect. The restaurant is recommended in its entirety. Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nacib, Thank you for your kind words. We will be sure to let Skerdi (The Manager) how much you appreciated his time with you! We hope that you come back to visit us again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Authentic Greek food. Ambiance is pleasant. Recommend meat platters.

The manager, Omid, is fantastic. We had zero complaints about the food but unfortunately there was some miscommunication between our server and back of house, as well as food taking a very long time. Omid made everything perfect again and took great care of us. For vegetarians, I highly highly recommend getting the souvlaki platter and asking for halloumi skewers: absolutely delicious. Dont forget dessert!
They treat you like family, and meet your every need. Enjoyed our evening out with my family and friends BIG HUGS TO YOU ALL ....ADAMMM. Parking: Would  love it bigger
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Photo23, Thanks for the great review! We are so happy you feel like part of our big Greek family! Hugs to you! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Really nice experience if you are looking for a place to hangout with friends and have a good time, they have different options of food to eat and what is great is that is a good place to order and share food with friends have some drinks try the specials of the greek and enjoy the experience, just don t be in a hurry and have time to enjoy the experience
Friendly staff, unique design and very delicious foods!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ananda, Thanks for stoping by! We hope to see you again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Favourite place in Vancouver. Both locations. Food is amazing the the vibes are one of / if not the best in the city.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Andrew! Thanks so much for the kind words! We appreciate you coming to see us and cant wait to see you again soon! - The Greek Team

reviews.review_text: The service was friendly and accommodating. The pita plate and zucchini chips were scrumptious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Wendy! Thanks for the great review! So glad to hear you enjoyed the kolokithakia crips, they are certainly delicious! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: They offered perfect afternoon with tasty food, fun and friendly staff! Come back here again for sure!! Thank you
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Yoko! Thanks for the great review! We are so happy to hear you had a great visit with us! See you soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: The perfect place to catch-up with your girlfriends - the food & drinks are absolutely delicious, the service is top-notch and the music sets the right vibe for a fabulous night out!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ruby! We are so glad to hear that you had a great time and we really appreciate your kind words. We hope to see you again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: The food and ambiance were perfect and the best part was our server Naima who was absolutely delightful, attentive, and knowledgeable about the wine and the menu. Can t wait to come back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tara! Thank you so much for leaving this great review! We will definitely let Naima know how impressive she was! Please come visit us again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Great experience! The drinks were amazing! And the staff was great! Super kind! Definitely coming back! Food : 5/5
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Pedro, Thanks for sharing these kind words! We cant wait to have you back! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: I was visiting gastown since it is a touristic place and I found this gem, loved the food and the staff made me feel comfortable, after I finished my food I stayed a little longer having some drinks even made a friend at the bar
Cozy but elegant atmosphere, great service, amazing food, delicious vegan options Vegetarian options: Several vegetarian/vegan options
Great Greek food, the staff was awesome, the venue was totally renovated, loved the ambiance!

Fantastic food, great portions and reasonably priced. Skerdi the bartender was top notch, super friendly and mad helpful!! Highly recommend adding this to your itinerary! Apparently it has a fun late night vibe and awesome happy hour !! Dietary restrictions: Great online menu that lets you select your constraints and pick from there!
Fantastic  food and service.  Adam was absolutely  fantastic  and really nice to deal with . A must in Vancouver  gastown
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Joe! Thanks for the great review and we are so happy to hear that Adam was able to provide such a great time for you! We hope to see you again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Our server Adam did an amazing job taking care of our very large group! Food and drinks were on point as well.

This place is amazing and our server (skerdi) was so friendly and accommodating. Great place!! Dietary restrictions: Gluten free options available and super yummy! The souvlaki platters were all accommodated for gluten free meals!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi McKenna, Thanks so much for the great review! We will be sure to let Skerdi know how wonderful he is! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Awesome place. I was on vacations there and found some cozy spot with nice food and great respectful staff. Would definitely come back!
I m here every Friday for some lamb chops and a few mezcal margaritas. Staff are always fun and friendly even when it s really busy.
Wonderful meal and great service. Thanks Adam from six Aussies who loved it from the first bite to the last sip.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rob! Thanks for the great review! We will be sure to let Adam know what a great job! We hope you come to visit when you are in Vancouver next! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Genuinely friendly service and huge portions of excellent food. Reasonably priced as well for Gastown area
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks David! We really appreciate the kind words and the review. Hope to see you again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Delicious food with amazing seasoning
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Azita! Thank you so much for leaving us this great review. We are so happy to hear you liked the food and hope you come back to visit soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Where do I even begin with this place??? I came here for the first time a couple years ago when I first moved to the neighborhood and have been a regular ever since. Phenomenal food, great atmosphere and even better service. Shoutout to Adam, Skerdi, Marcus, Naima, Ignacia for making this place feel like a second home. 12/10 recommend. Good place for chill vibes but also gets bumpin sometimes which is fab
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Madison, Thank you so much for leaving us these incredibly kind words. We love having you in as much as you love being here with us. We cant wait to see you soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Literally the best, authentic Greek food I ve ever eaten! Amazing service, good vibes, worth every drachma.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jason! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this amazing review! We really appreciate it and are so happy to hear you enjoyed the food and the atmosphere! Please stop by again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Havent had a calamari that good in Vancouver ever.  Perfect.  Thank you
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow Rich! Thank you for this rave review! Come back for some more calamari anytime! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Marcus is my favourite bartender in gastown. His energy, ability to be intuitive with what kind of night we re going for, and demeanour is always spot on.  Only coming to the Greek when he s working!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Megan! Thanks for leaving this great review for Marcus! We will be sure to let him know how wonderful he is! We cant wait to have you come visit again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: My family and I went here for dinner tonight and it was a great experience! They were understaffed but let us know before seating us. The food was excellent and the people were great! I specifically want to thank Marisol for her wonderful service! She was amazing and made the visit incredible! Highly recommend this place if youre in search of great Greek food and amazing service. We will definitely be visiting the next time were in Vancouver.
The staffs attention is incredibly attentive, the place is cozy, and the food is delicious. A perfect experience!
My absolute favourite restaurant! The food is amazing, staff is friendly and accommodating. The manager is always so kind and helpful as well. It is always a 10/10 experience here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Albana, We are so happy to hear you had such a great experience with us! We look forward to seeing you again soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: The lemon potatoes here are amazing! lots of vegan options as well! We sat at the bar and the bartender Brigitte was very friendly and made great drinks! Cool vibe, definitely recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Madi! Thank you so much for stopping by and for leaving this amazing review. We will be sure to let Brigitte know that you enjoyed her service. We look forward to hosting you again soon! Kaity Allen Regional Manager

reviews.review_text: Great place, my first time in Vancouver and it was the perfect place to end my trip. Food delicious and service very friendly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Maria! Thank you for the kind words! We hope you come to visit us again the next time you come to Vancouver! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: It was my first time coming to this restaurant and I was absolutely blown away! The ambiance was beautiful and the food was devine. We had the beyond-meat souvlaki and haloumi caprese; the flavours were delicious and the presentation of the plating was great. The most impressive part was the phenomenal service. Our server was Rachel and she was beyond amazing. Attentive, kind, and just a lovely human. We felt comfortable and really enjoyed our experience - will definitely be coming back and recommending to others!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience! We re so happy to hear you enjoyed yourselves. We can t wait to see you back again soon!

reviews.review_text: My husband and I walked around Gaston and decided this was the restaurant we wanted to eat at. We shared the souvlaki platter and a Greek salad. Everything was fantastic. We sat at the bar and visited with the bartender (I believe he was the owner). It was a wonderful experience, would highly recommend it and would gladly go there again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us & hope to see you back soon! Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Amazing Greek cuisine and wonderful,  professional and very helpful staff.  My first meal there was perfect,   I will be returning soon.  I would recommend The Greek Gastown to everyone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Wayne, Thanks for this amazing review! We hope to indeed see you soon! - The Greek Gastown Team

reviews.review_text: Sat down and had a solo dinner with myself. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive. The food deeeelicious - I will definitely be going back. Recommend for their Calamari and selection of cocktails    I was also able to slip in for Happy Hour with 5 mins to spare! Highly recommend!
The Food is very good and great drinks, The host very kind since we arrive.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Daniel! Thank you for your kind words! We hope to have you back soon! - The Greek Gastown Team
